page.title: 07MEANS OF TRANSPORT
page.content: We found out that nearly everyone these days travels by car,but some people do walk.It seems to be mostly old people that walk and young people that use cars,also old people use buses.When we looked at the A58 Leeds- Wetherby road to see how many vehicles came past we found out that 73% cars 13% vans, 11% lorries ,1% buses,1% coaches, 1% motor bikes. We also found out that people do use cars quite a bit.One man that we interviewed said he traveled 60 miles a day in his car. Other people only used their cars 3-10 miles a day. In general we found that this was a small commuter village.there were few local jobs and people had to travel to work to Leeds,Harrogate and York.
